review: For netflix and other providers that have a native application it is great. If you are trying to watch content through a providers portal say abc/nbc/fx or anything that may have their own watch it on their site content without a google appstore app... it hasnt been all that great - pixelation, chopping...I was hoping to cut the cord and use this along with an hd antenna... but the tech isnt there yet for an easy passive watching experience.  As more people use these devices maybe more chromecast applications will be available for the bigger networks, but for now the cord is intact.
author: gary b kelly

review: WOW! I scored this when it was on sale recently, and now I'm getting ready to buy a couple more, plus some as Christmas presents! This thing immediately transformed my several-year-old LCD into a smart TV, and couldn't be any easier to set up and use. Even if there isn't a specific App for something, whatever is on your screen can be cast to the TV. Now I can bring up Xfinity TV Go on my phone, and watch shows in the bedroom where I don't have a digital cable box or a newer smart TV. This thing rocks, and belongs in every TV in the house! Since you can name each one, it's simple to cast to the correct device in the applicable room.
